p: Conversely, the SS rootlet fresh and dry weights were higher than the CS rootlet weights. The area of the medicinal parts was measured using a root area machine. The results showed that the CS medicinal area was 83.76 cm 2 and the SS area was 62.73 cm 2 ( Figure 2). The CS root tuber area was significantly larger than the SS tuber area ( Figure 3). A visual assessment of P. multiflorum roots confirmed that the CS root biomass was relatively larger than the SS root biomass ( Figure 3).
